projects.title: Mingle
projects.subtitle: Modern Social media platform built with Next.js
projects.description: Mingle is an interactive social media web application designed to simulate a similar environment to well-known social media platforms. It focuses on a seamless experience for users to share their ideas with posts, interacting with other users by liking posts, and sharing opinions with comments.
features: Dynamic posts listings with image galleries
Ability to follow and unfollow users
Viewing profiles with user details and posts
Responsive UI built with Tailwind CSS

projects.title: XChange
projects.description: XChange is a full-stack currency exchange application built with Next.js and Node.js. It supports real-time currency conversion, authentication, role-based access, and secure admin features for managing rates and users.
features: Real-time currency rate updates
Authentication and role-based access
Admin dashboard for managing users
Fully responsive and secure design

projects.title: HotelEase
projects.description: HotelEase is a sleek and efficient hotel booking web application designed to make room browsing and reservation simple and fast. It provides a seamless interface for users to explore hotels, view detailed room listings, check availability, and confirm bookings.
features: Simple hotel listing and reservation system
Clean and minimal UI/UX design
Responsive layout for all devices
Optimised page loading and navigation

projects.title: Inteo
projects.subtitle: Modern interior design landing page
projects.description: A responsive, animated single-page website built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS, showcasing services, works, awards, and a bold hero CTA.
features: Responsive layout and utility-first styling with Tailwind CSS
Scroll-triggered animations using Intersection Observer hooks
Reusable components: Hero, Services, Works, About, Awards, Metrics, CTA, Nav, Footer
Optimised assets with WebP images and inline SVG icons

projects.title: Jewels
projects.subtitle: Elegant, responsive storefront UI built with React
projects.description: A polished single-page jewellery storefront featuring curated collections, hero marketing, and social proof. Built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS using Vite for a fast development and build pipeline.
features: Responsive landing layout with hero, collections, and CTA
Best Sellers and Trending sections with rich imagery
About Us and Instagram showcase for brand storytelling
Reusable UI components (nav, footer, buttons) for consistency
